name: Protagon VR
description: Protagon is a hybrid casual game that blends concepts from mini-golf and pinball with an intuitive VR interface. Just pull the handle on the ball, aim and release to launch it into the zero-gravity course!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires SteamVR headset and controller (HTC Vive)
